definition: tending to draw together or constrict soft organic tissue, a drug that causes contraction of body tissues and canals
details:
adjective
- tending to draw together or constrict soft organic tissue
= example: tending to draw together or constrict soft organic tissue
- sour or bitter in taste
= synonyms: acerb, acerbic
noun
- a drug that causes contraction of body tissues and canals
= synonyms: styptic, astringent drug
